text: Nicola Bianchi from the University of Padova, Italy was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to the theory and practice of electric machine design and control. ==References== ==External links== * Category:20th-century births Category:Living people Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Nicola Bianchi
